0.text: Innate: Kayn has a secondary experience bar that tracks progress toward  Darkin and  Shadow Assassin forms. He gathers orbs from champion  takedowns and each instance of damage (excluding damage over time) against champions. Once he has earned enough orbs, he unlocks a form based on whether he earned more from  Melee or  Ranged champions (for  Darkin and  Shadow Assassin, respectively), with the other form unlocked later.

1.text: Kayn can return to the summoning platform to transform over 6 seconds, during which he is  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act. Kayn cannot choose a form if he is unable to cast abilities. The transformation will permanently empower some of Kayn's abilities, and he gains a one-time Homeguard.

2.text: Shadow Assassin Bonus: If Kayn has been out of combat with enemy champions for over 8 seconds, or he casts  Umbral Trespass, he deals 8% − 30% (based on level) of post-mitigation damage dealt against enemy champions as bonus magic damage, lasting for 3 seconds upon entering combat and also applying on the first instance of damage dealt. If this effect is ready, it will not go on cooldown by receiving damage.

3.text: Darkin Bonus: Rhaast  heals for 25% − 35% (based on level) of the post-mitigation  physical damage that he deals to enemy champions with his abilities.

0.text: Active: Kayn  dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through. He then swings his scythe, dealing the same damage to surrounding enemies.

1.text: Both instances of Reaping Slash deal 40 bonus damage against  minions and  monsters.

2.text: Darkin Bonus: Reaping Slash's damage is modified to deal 65% AD (+ 5% (+ 5% per 100 bonus AD) of the target's maximum health) physical damage for both instances. This damage has a cap against monsters that does not include the bonus damage.

3.text: Reaping Slash's dash speed scales with Kayn's  total movement speed.

0.text: Active: Kayn swings his scythe in the target direction, dealing physical damage and  slowing enemies hit by 90% decaying over 1.5 seconds.

1.text: Shadow Assassin Bonus: Blade's Reach's area is extended by 200 units. Kayn conjures an  untargetable living shadow at the casting position to perform Blade's Reach's sweep over 0.55 seconds in his stead, removing the ability's cast time.

2.text: Darkin Bonus: Blade's Reach knocks up enemies hit for 1 second.

0.text: Active: Kayn gains  40% bonus total movement speed,  ghosting and the ability to ignore terrain collision for a duration. If he has been in combat with enemy champions within the last 3 seconds, Shadow Step will instead last 1.5 seconds.

1.text: Kayn  heals himself upon entering terrain for the first time from casting Shadow Step and he gains  unobstructed vision while inside.

2.text: Receiving damage from or dealing damage to an enemy  champion while Shadow Step is active reduces its remaining duration to 1.5 seconds. This effect also cannot remain active out of terrain for longer than 1.5 seconds and will cancel immediately if Kayn performs a basic attack or becomes  immobilized, excluding from  sleep(bug), or  polymorphed.

3.text: Shadow Assassin Bonus: Shadow Step's  cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds at all ranks. Kayn gains 100%  slow resist and, upon entering terrain, the bonus total movement speed is increased to 80% for the remaining duration.

0.text: Passive: Kayn marks enemy champions he damaged in the last 3.15 seconds.

1.text: Active: Kayn  vanishes and  dashes to a marked enemy champion. Upon arrival, he  channels for up to 2.5 seconds,  attaching to the target and  revealing them. Umbral Trespass can be recast after 0.75 seconds during the channel, and does so automatically after the duration or is  interrupted.

2.text: Recast: After a 0.75-second delay, Kayn deals physical damage to the target and  dashes out from their body in the target direction while still being  untargetable.

3.text: Shadow Assassin Bonus: Umbral Trespass gains 200 bonus cast range and emerge range. Additionally, emerging will reset  The Darkin Scythe's  cooldown.

4.text: Darkin Bonus: Umbral Trespass is modified to deal 15% (+ 13% per 100 bonus AD) of the target's maximum health physical damage, and  heals him for 9.75% (+ 8.45% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health.

1.originHTML: +  650

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • yellow
  • totem
  • trinket

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+7% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Challenging Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Challenging Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all of this item's effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • jungle

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Thirsting Slash: Deal 175% base AD physical damage to enemies in a 450 radius centered around you. Heal for 20% AD (+ 8% of your missing health) for each enemy champion hit (15 (reduced by ability haste) second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – THIRSTING SLASH: Deal 175% base AD physical damage to enemies in a  450 radius centered around you.  Heal for 20% AD (+ 8% of your missing health) for each enemy champion hit (15 (reduced by ability haste) second cooldown).

Passive

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+55 attack damage
+15 ability haste
+45 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage, and heals you for 120% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IGNORE PAIN: Stores ( 30% /  10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Carve: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.
Unique – Rage: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion grants 3 bonus movement speed per stack of Carve on them for 2 seconds, up to 18.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CARVE: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.

1.concerningText: Kayn  heals himself upon entering terrain for the first time from casting Shadow Step and he gains  unobstructed vision while inside.

0.concerningText: Recast: After a 0.75-second delay, Kayn deals physical damage to the target and  dashes out from their body in the target direction while still being  untargetable.
Active: Kayn  dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through. He then swings his scythe, dealing the same damage to surrounding enemies.
